title: chilon
author: chilon
content: Hi; I have great shoes from Istanbul. Selling a pair for 29usd but the min order is 8 pairs. The shipping costs about 125usd (air cargo arrives in 7 days). Anyone interesteded just contact with me via mail. malili86@gmail.com Payment will be in BTC or skycoin.

comments.author: Saint-loup
comments.created_time: July 23, 2022, 08:35:02 PMLast edit: July 24, 2022, 06:34:27 AM by Saint-loup
comments.body: Quote from: chilon on July 23, 2022, 12:42:05 PMHi; I have great shoes from Istanbul. Selling a pair for 29usd but the min order is 8 pairs. The shipping costs about 125usd (air cargo arrives in 7 days). Anyone interesteded just contact with me via mail. malili86@gmail.com Payment will be in BTC or skycoin.Hello chilon what brand(s) of sneakers are you selling precisely please? Are they famous? Your sneakers are genuine or counterfeit ? The price would be a little bit expensive for counterfeits, even of good quality IMO. Is it possible to provide some pictures please?

comments.author: chilon
comments.created_time: July 24, 2022, 02:51:03 PMLast edit: July 25, 2022, 11:52:49 AM by chilon
comments.body: It is my friends brand. Not a famous brand. Just think about it as no name. If u contact with me, I can send all the details.

comments.author: Blossom15
comments.body: please post some pictures of the sneakers.
